statements: SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, delivery_address FROM orders
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT order_date, customer_name FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, customer_name, status FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, delivery_address FROM orders WHERE status = 'delivered'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT order_id, status FROM orders WHERE delivery_address IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM OrderDetails WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM OrderDetails WHERE order_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM OrderDetails WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM OrderDetails WHERE product_name IN ('Product A', 'Product B') ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Order WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Order;
SELECT item_name FROM Order_Items WHERE order_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, status, delivery_date FROM Delivery_Status WHERE status = 'delivered';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, item_name, status FROM Order JOIN Order_Items ON Order.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Delivery_Status ON Order.order_id = Delivery_Status.order_id;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Order WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM Order WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT order_id, item_name FROM Order_Items WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, status, delivery_date FROM Delivery_Status WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM Order;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Products.product_name, Order_Items.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE status='delivered';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE Orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name, Order_Items.quantity FROM Orders INNER JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id INNER JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.status='pending';

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Orders.delivery_date, Products.product_name, Order_Items.quantity FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id INNER JOIN Order_Items ON Orders.order_id = Order_Items.order_id INNER JOIN Products ON Order_Items.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY Orders.order_date ASC, Order_Items.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, delivery_date, status, product_name FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.customer_name = 'Alice Smith' AND products.price > 100 ORDER BY order_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.customer_name, delivery_status.status, delivery_status.update_time FROM orders JOIN delivery_status ON orders.order_id = delivery_status.order_id WHERE orders.status = 'Delivered' AND delivery_status.status = 'Delivered';
